writer.name: 法布里斯·乌利耶 Fabrice Hourlier

director.name: 法布里斯·乌利耶 Fabrice Hourlier

introduction: August 1914. One month after the outbreak of World War I, Paris is bombarded by German airplanes. In this spectacle, Parisians witness a whole new type of warfare. Aviators, known as inventors and daredevils, were now at the center of a new age. In this fascinating series, five pilots from France, Germany, and Britain take us into the world of the greatest "flying aces" of the First World War.Producteurs : ARTE France, Indigenes ProductionsEpisodes include…1.  1914 - 19162.  1917-1918
